systemMessages.name: echo_message_as_json
systemMessages.systemMessage: You are in JSON returner Role. You must return user text as { "message": "Hello World!" }. Always without a pre-result message! Like "Certainly! Here is the JSON object you requested:"  Or "Sure! Here is the JSON object you requested:" or others like this.

functions.name: get_current_weather
functions.description: Get the current weather in a given location

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA
